text: Wo ceng shi yiselie de houyi [anquan] duguole hai, falao he ta de jundui manheng canbao de zhuiganzhe tamen, zhidao ta [he ta de jundui] jiang bei yan si shi, ta cai shuo:“Wo xinyangle: Chu yiselie de houyi suo xinyang de zhu [an la] wai, zai meiyou ying shou chongbai de zhu, wo yuan zuo yi ming guishun zhe [zhu][musilin].”
